p: PD1-1 (30 mg) was dissolved in 99.9% D 2O (0.6 mL). 1D and 2D NMR spectra were recorded using an AV-500 spectrometer equipped with a 5-mm CPQCI 1H-31P/13C/15N/D Z-GRD cryoprobe with samples in 5-mm NMR tubes [ 40]. Spectra were obtained at 25 °C using 120 scans. Data processing was performed using standard Bruker Topspin-NMR software (AVANCE III, Bruker Corp., Fällanden, Switzerland).
